Room.Name: Leviathan Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Leviathan Drive, west of the Knightly Order of the Black Cross and east of the impressive Ashton Falls Resort and Inn.
Room.LongDescription: The Knightly Order of the Black Cross acts in conjunction with the Order of the White Cross to establish order and harmony. There is a border between the two Orders that all Paladins must pass through. Knowledge and control of one's dark side will make the Paladin all the more stronger in his or her quest.
